pages.text: $(li)The Void Heart is an item that can be placed with any kind of $(l)Tool$() or $(l)Armor$() in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l) to prevent the $(l)Too Expensive!$() message and be able to repair that item with any experience cost.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/hunger)Hungers$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
